description: Detects usage of attrib.exe to hide files from users.
author: Sami Ruohonen
false_positives: IgfxCUIService.exe hiding *.cui files via .bat script (attrib.exe a child of cmd.exe and igfxCUIService.exe is the parent of the cmd.exe)
name: Hiding Files with Attrib.exe
query: ((((process.executable.text:"*\\attrib.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"ATTRIB.EXE")) AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \+h\ *") AND (NOT ((process.command_line.text:"*\\desktop.ini\ *") OR ((process.parent.executable.text:"*\\cmd.exe" AND process.command_line.text:+R +H +S +A \\\*.cui AND process.parent.command_line.text:C:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\\*.bat)))))
